классная игра

Когда я проходил Portal 2 впервые, а это был далекий 2011 год, меня сильно зацепил сюжет. И в этой игре он особенно хорош, в отличии от того же самого Portal. Также в игре есть отдельная компания для co-op. Если описать Portal 2 несколькими словами, то это будет: "Сюжет и море сарказма в исполнении ИИ".
круто !
its portal

Довольно не плохой сюжет,проходил с интересом,при этом испытывал чувства грусти и радости.Денег своих стоит.
Хочу сказать отдельно про проходняк в 2,понравился больше чем главный сюжет,за один день с другом с огромным удовольствием прошли и потом вспоминали как было классно)
Рекомендую:).

対戦じゃないパズルゲームをこういうｴﾓｰｼｮﾅﾙな、ﾄﾞﾗﾏﾁｯｸな形で出せる向こうの人はすげえなあって思います。

名作ゲームの条件として、基本ルールが極めて明快ってトコ大事だと思います。
例えば、私ＳＴＧは得意じゃないんですが斑鳩。アレなんかもＳＴＧとしてはかってないヘンテコなルールですが視覚的にも明快にわかる。＆見てて美しく楽しい。

このゲームもそうで、基本ルールは出口と入り口を白い壁に造れるよ！！だけですがそれでいっぱい考えさせてくれる、理想的な基本設計です。

あとは本当に、ＳＦストーリー部分でしょうか。登場人物、というか主人公以外はＡＩ、
たまに記録音声くらいしか出てきませんがキョーレツな個性を誇る楽しい連中です。
特に何よりWheatley。「ある事」に特化して作られたＡＩですが、その彼が作中もっとも
人間臭さにあふれているのがこの作品最大の皮肉ではないでしょうか。

Si no has jugado a Portal 1, haz scroll hacia arriba y dale a comprar Portal Bundle, DA IGUAL EL PRECIO.

Estos juegos merecen la pena 101%, la diferencia grafica respecto al 1 no es "demasiado" fuerte lo unico que hacen es aprovechar nuevas mecanicas/fisicas del motor grafico source, que es una maravilla.

Con todo el respeto... esto es MASTERPIECE, y no voy a decir más por que spoileo cosas chulas, solo decir que de esta saga se han inspirado decenas/cientos de compañias.
R.I.P old valve. :(

This is definitely my favorite game of all time. its fun, creative, well written, and gives you puzzles that make you feel like a genius when you finally solve them. With an awesome cooperative campaign that's fun every time you play it, the game still has a thriving friendly community with levels being made everyday! All in all this game is good fun.

Valve had many good works out there and this is yet another one of them. Decently humorous yet charming story-flow, easy to hard challenging puzzles, adequately long gameplay, both well-designed graphics and voice acting all evenly contribute to it's highly fun atmosphere without any apparent flaw. A literal definition of "all in one". If only they had carried on developing those in demand most it'd all even be greater.

[b]Portal 2[/b] Realmente é muito bom, depois de anos eu resolvi jogar, possuindo um cooperativo e uma história incrível, com uma interessantíssima conexão entre as histórias de [b]Half-Life[/b] e [b]Portal 2[/b], e contando com excelentes puzzles que podem fazer você perder a cabeça.

J U E G A Z O, jugaste portal 1? No se porque todavia no compraste este, este porta expande todo el universo mostrado en el uno. Extiende mucho mas las mecanicas del primer juego y agrega nuevas, logran hacer una historia mas larga y cambiante, lo cual habia sido el punto malo del primer videojuego, y aparte su historia es mucho mejor conectando con la primera y consiguiendo un gran final. 10/10

Holy SH**, this game is AMAZING! Right of the back, it hits you with the nostalgia from the first game, seeing the first chamber in ruins, and it gets better from here. This game's got it all: spectacular gameplay, amazing voice acting, music, and sound design, and humour here and there to lighten the mood. The puzzles are challenging, but they're made in a way where, you can sit for hours not knowing what to do, but as soon as you figure out that one small thing everything just snaps. The story for this game was also really good IMO, but I don't really know what to say about it. All in all, if you're looking for a fun and challenging puzzle game, with a good story, this is the game for you. Have fun!

At the very beginning I wanted to say that the idea for separate rooms was great especially for players with weaker computers (like me, ehm), so that they could enjoy the game just like everyone else with players' computers.
The game was so great to play that I would definitely get more achievements after I defeated all the solo and coop rooms.
I can say that both myself and my friend, all we need to be happy, are two white walls facing each other. That's how I spent half an hour (if not more!) In this game. We also loved to capture the turrets and listen to their cute voices saying to put them away.
The plot in the single was good, the puzzles were difficult and the voice acting was great. There were moments in which I was afraid and there were moments in which I laughed - it's half the success of a good game. In a few rooms I didn't know what to do, thankfully the internet came with the help (solutions were simpler than it might seem).
What can I say more? If you are considering buying this game, I encourage you to buy it. Have fun!
